alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:27PM CDT until August 07 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 426 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Antioch, or 20 miles east of Alliance, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Snow Lake, Bingham, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Finnegan Lake, Jerry Lake, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake and Wild Horse Flats. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 8. Highway 2 between mile markers 102 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
